ruleBookInfo.intro:
{{$..introduction}}

-----------
包含本书的书单：
{{$..booklist[*]}}
<js>
result.replace(/\{_id=.*?, booklistId=\{shielded=.*?,|\}/g,'').replace(/_id=/g,'书单id：').replace(/, title=/g,'  书单名：')
</js>

ruleContent.content:
function parseComments(n){ for(var c=[],e=0;e "; score ="评分："+ "⭐".repeat(n.score); content = " 评价："+ n.content; html+=bookname+bookcover+score+content+" "+"-------------------- " } return html } var data = JSON.parse(result); if(data.data.comments){ data.data.comments.length === 0 ? '还没有人对这本书发表评价哦！
｡◕‿◕｡' : parseComments(data.data.comments); }else{ data.data.books.length === 0 ? '书单里还没有书！
｡◕‿◕｡' :parseBooklist(data.data.books); }

ruleSearch.author: class.user-name@text||$.author||$.userName
ruleSearch.intro: 点击数:{{$.clicks}}次 共{{$.bookTotal}}本##点击数:次 共本
ruleSearch.lastChapter: {{$.score}}分▪最近更新时间：{{$.updateAt}}@js:result.replace(/\..*|^分▪/,'').replace('T|最近更新时间：$',' ')
ruleSearch.name: class.booklistName@text||$.title##</*em>

ruleExplore.author:
<js>
if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('p.0@a.0@text||class.panel-heading.0@a.1@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")||baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.3@a@text');
}
else if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)){
java.getString('td.4@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){
java.getString('td.5@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('class.author@a.0@text');
}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getElements('@css:.panel-heading,tbody tr');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getElements('class.book-img-text@li');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getElements('class.panel panel-default&&class.well well-sm table-responsive')
}
else{
result=java.getElements('tbody@tr');
if(baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
result=['β'].concat(result);
}
result;
}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)||baseUrl.includes("shouding/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('class.panel-heading.0@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@href||a@href').replace("/d","");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){
java.getString('td.2@a@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")||baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
java.getString('td.0@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@href').replace("/m","");
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
"https://www.qidiantu.com/info/"+String(java.getString('h2@a@href')).match(/\d+/)[0];
}
</js>

}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")){
r=java.getStringList('td.5@text&&td.6@text&&td.7@text&&td.8@text&&td.9@text');
"收藏:"+r[0]+",粉丝:"+r[1]+",收订比:"+r[2]+"
首V时刻:"+r[4]+",首V字数:"+r[3];
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
result=java.getString('td.4@text&&td.5@text');
String(result).replace(/(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)/,"收藏:$1,粉丝:$2");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")){
result=java.getString('td.4@text&&td.5@text&&td.6@text');
String(result).replace(/(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)?/,"收藏:$1,推荐:$2,更新:$3");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
result=java.getString('td.7@text&&td.4@text&&td.5@text&&td.8@text');
String(result).replace(/(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)?/,"粉丝:$1,收藏:$2,推荐:$3,更新:$4");
}
else if(result=="β"){""}
else if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)){
"粉丝数:"+java.getString('td.2@text')+"
获得时间:"+java.getString('td.-1@text')
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("twelvekings")){
"粉丝数:"+java.getString('td.3@text')+"
"+java.getString('td.1@text')+"年"
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('class.intro@text');
}
</js>

java.getString('td.1@ownText&&td.3@text');

"获得时间:"+java.getString('td.1@text')
}

ruleExplore.name:
<js>
if(result=="β"){"荣誉徽章"}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('h1@text||class.panel-heading.0@h4@text').slice(1,-1);

java.getString('td.2@a@text');
}

java.getString('td.1@a@text');
}

String(java.getString('td.1@a@text||a@text')).replace(/^.*?-|-.{10}（点击查看推荐效果）/g,"");
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("badge/")||baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
java.getString('td.0@a.0@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('div@h2@a@text');
}
</js>
